system.description:
Trigger: The user would be hit by an attack.

Effect: The triggering attack fails to hit the user, and additional attacks that would hit also fail to hit the user until their next activation, including [Max] attacks. Attacks failing to hit the user do not activate on-miss effects.

Requirement: User is Dynamaxed and has a Status-Category attack on their Active List.
